'''Energy Extraction Devices''' (also known as '''Saghira Machines''') are an [[Exploration]] mechanic in [[Sumeru]]. There are eight of these devices scattered around the edges of Sumeru's rainforest.

==Overview==
These devices are found in ruined forts guarded by various [[The Eremites/Enemies|Eremites]]. When approached, a challenge starts in which the player is tasked with turning off the device by finding two or three control keys and returning them to the device. When a control key is touched, additional Eremites will spawn to attack the player. Straying too far from the fort will cause the challenge to fail and reset, requiring the keys to be collected again.

Once all control keys are found and the player returns to the device to shut it off, a challenge starts: Eremites will appear in three waves that pause this process and must be defeated in order to progress. Once the last wave of Eremites is cleared, the device fully shuts off and spawns an [[Exquisite Chest]].

Shut down all eight devices to start the {{Quest|The Foolish Fatuus}}.

==Locations==
See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=399 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations. Energy Extraction Device is labeled as "Saghira Machine" in the interactive map.
